title: Spring Gospel Meeting
description:
_March 10th - 13th_

_At the building_

Speaker: Don Loftis

Theme: Stories that Change Our Lives 

* Times and Topics
  * Sunday 9:00 a.m. - "The Art of Humility" 
  * Sunday 10:00 a.m. - "An Invitation We Cannot Refuse" 
  * Sunday 6:00 p.m. - "Using Our Tools Well" 
  * Monday 7:00 p.m. - "The Richest Person in the World" 
  * Tuesday 7:00 p.m. - "Responding to a Father's Love" 
  * Wednesday 7:00 p.m. - "Created for Good Works"
